biotools.summary: Text-mining approach based on conditional random field (CRF) for extracting a wide range of sequence variants in both protein and gene levels according to a standard sequence variants nomenclature developed by the human genome variation society (HGVS).

bioschemas.name: tmVar
bioschemas.summary: Text-mining approach based on conditional random field (CRF) for extracting a wide range of sequence variants in both protein and gene levels according to a standard sequence variants nomenclature developed by the human genome variation society (HGVS).
